name: Media Bar Enhanced
description:
A feature-rich fork of the original Media Bar script by MakD that brings your home screen to life.

-> 100% Configurable via Web UI: Manage all features, lists, and settings effortlessly through the plugin configuration page.

Key Highlights:
- Cinematic Video Backdrops: Supports local & YouTube trailers (incl. SponsorBlock)
- Custom Content: Curate your slideshow with specific Collections, Playlists, or seasonal events

Additional Features:
- Full-width immersive mode
- Smart resolution handling (up to 4K)
- Full keyboard navigation & playback control
- Wait-for-trailer options
- Customizable pagination & animations

If you do not have write permissions to the web folder, please also install the file-transformation plugin.
overview: Transforms your Jellyfin home screen with an immersive, fully configurable media slideshow featuring video backdrops.

versions.changelog: - feat: Enhance custom media ID functionality with manual YouTube trailer override support

- Fix the issue where buttons were cut off on smaller screens such as on S24/S25.
- Update mediaBarEnhanced.js and mediaBarEnhanced.css with version 3.0.9 from original repo
- Fixes issues with persistent slides-container visibility
- Update mediaBarEnhanced.js and mediaBarEnhanced.css with version 3.0.8 from original repo

- Add Youtube video quality preference setting (Auto / 1080p / Highres)
- Set preferred video quality on YouTube player based on setting
- Add method to resume video playback when slideshow is active
- Add method to pause all video playback when navigating away from home screen

- 'custom media IDs' setting is now enabled by default (no input --> random selection)
- improve GUID handling in slideshow manager to handle seperator and description
